nodes.text: Razor-boars were a species native to an uncharted swamp planet in Wild Space which was nicknamed Graf-World by the Graf family of cartographers. While traveling through the world's swamps in a landspeeder searching for her brother, Lina Graf silenced the family droid CR-8R in case the sound he was making attracted razor-boars.
Razor-boars were first mentioned in the novel Adventures in Wild Space: The Escape, which was written by Cavan Scott and released in 2016.
